metadata.title: CVE-2018-7439 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in FreeXL before 1.0.5. There is a heap-basedbuffer over-read in the function read_mini_biff_next_record.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7439` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfreexl1 - 1.0.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freexl package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.5-1').
